content: the same way the first time i made these and later had to fix this mistake the wings should be mirror images of each other the wings are symmetrical and you can just change the point where you add the yellow border lay a teal and yellow wing over the top of each other with starts and ends matching put the wing border on top on one the yellow border will go all the way on the right and the other will go all the way on the left the part of the wing that attaches to the body has a raw edge without this border sew all three together with a long strand of yellow yarn and a tapestry needle sew by putting the needle through a yellow stitch the top bit of the wing and coming out the other side yellow stitch see image make sure you are going through the two sides of the border and the two wing pieces you will see horizontal bars of yarn and not over top of the border see image use the long teal tail to sew together the bottom of the yellow and teal wings see second image when sewing these just catch threads of yarn on the inside of the wings so the stitches do not show on the outside hide the other tails in the yellow border piece or between the wings repeat for second wing pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin when sewing the wings to the body i wrapped the orange thread around multiple times so no or at least minimal teal yarn showed feet use yellow yarn round 1 chain 5 1 turning chain round 2 work in the top legs of the chain stitches 4 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the last chain 3 single_crochet on the other side legs catching the starting tail while you work increase in the last leg/chain round 3 increase 3 single_crochet 3 increase 3 single_crochet 2 increase 18 round 4 work in the back loops only 18 single_crochet round 5 decrease 3 single_crochet 3 decrease 3 single_crochet 2 decrease 12 round 6 decrease 3 single_crochet decrease over three stitches 3 single_crochet decrease add small amount of stuffing finish off and leave a long tail and add a small amount of stuffing sew the legs of the stitches together with the long tail you can use this long tail to sew the feet to the legs of the pokemon sew the feet at a bit of an angle the hips will follow the round bottom of the body and the feet should lay flat so it can stand on a table repeat for the other foot pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin feet claws row 1 2 single_crochet and 1 turning chain row 2 decrease finish off leaving long tail repeat until you have 6 claws
